titleStmt.title: Edmund A. Starling to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG14373

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

body.p:
Head Quarters U. S. Forces
Hopkinsville Jany 11. 1864
His Excellency
Thos. E. Bramlette
Governor of Kentucky
Frankfort.
Governor:
Enclosed is an order I will issue here, as soon as I can have items printed.
In view of the lukewarm disposition shown by many to enroll themselves into organizations, I would respectfully suggest, would it not be well to adopt something similar to this throughout the state?
I beg to assure you Governor, of my highest respect, and to remain

Very Respectfully
Your Obt Svt
Edmund A. Starling
Col 35 Regt Ky Mt Infy
Comdg
